name: Planhat
description: Send user activity data to Planhat

config.name: Tenant Token
config.hint: You can get it from the Developer section in Planhat

config.name: Event Whitelist
config.hint: A comma separated list of events that will be sent to Planhat

config.name: Event Blacklist
config.hint: A comma separated list of events that will never be sent to Planhat

config.markdown:
## User Settings

### Whitelist and Blacklist format

The format should be a CSV file with 1 column (so just a list separated with new lines).
Header is not required but if it is present it must be called `externalId`

config.name: User Whitelist
config.hint: A list of identified users that will be sent to Planhat

config.name: User Blacklist
config.hint: A list of identified users that will never be sent to Planhat
